hidrocl.variables.methods module¶

hidrocl.variables.methods.checkdatabase(database, catchment_names=None)[source]¶

Check if the database exists and is valid

Parameters:

  • database – str with the path to the database

  • catchment_names – list with the catchment names

Returns:

pandas.DataFrame with the observations

hidrocl.variables.methods.get_catchment_name(catchment, catchment_names)[source]¶

Get catchment name from catchment ID

Parameters:

  • catchment – str (catchment name) or int (catchment ID)

  • catchment_names – list with the catchment names

Returns:

str (catchement name)

hidrocl.variables.methods.plot_variable(catchment, observations, what='valid')[source]¶

Plot variable for a catchment

Parameters:

  • catchment – str (catchment name)

  • observations – pandas.DataFrame with the observations

  • what – str (‘valid’ or ‘all’)

Returns:

plot
